fields.name: AppConsistentFrequencyInMinutes
fields.description: The app consistent snapshot frequency in minutes.

fields.name: CrashConsistentFrequencyInMinutes
fields.description: The crash consistent snapshot frequency in minutes.

fields.name: EnableMultiVMSync
fields.description: A value indicating whether multi-VM sync has to be enabled.

fields.name: RecoveryPointHistoryInMinutes
fields.description: The duration in minutes until which the recovery points need to be stored.
